page.title: 01Gazetteer
page.content: This is a rural area with one village Ecclefechan.Ecclefechan is situated on the A74 Carlisle to Edinburgh road approximately 8 miles from Gretna and 6 miles from Lockerbie. As most of the local industry is mixed farming the majority of people travel further afield for employment. The buildings in the village remain virtually unchanged since the late 18th Century, the only more recent additions being a local Council housing estate and a small private housing development.Ecclefechan is linked with a number of well known historical figures;see page 2.
